Method.name: CleanGlobals
Method.Implementation:
write !, "Cleaning Globals ..." write !, "Start time: "_$ztime($piece($horolog, ",", 2), 1)
$$$VAR
set count = 0
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; VARLicenseUsageLog ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - kill ^VARLicenseUsageLog
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; VAR Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Compras Related Data... " kill ^VARPedidoCompra, ^VARPedidoCompras kill ^VARPedidoCompraLinha, ^VARPedidoCompraLinhas kill ^VARPedidoCompraEntrega, ^VARPedidoCompraEntregas kill ^VARPedidoCompraEntregaLinha, ^VARPedidoCompraEntregaLinhas kill ^VARPedidoCompraHistorico, ^VARPedidoCompraHistoricos kill ^VARCompraEntrega, ^VARCompraEntregas kill ^VARCompraEntregaLinha, ^VARCompraEntregaLinhas set count = 7 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
write !, "Pedido de Transferência Related Data... " kill ^VARPreRequisicao, ^VARPreRequisicaos kill ^VARPreRequisicaoLinha, ^VARPreRequisicaoLinhas kill ^VARPreReqAprovacao, ^VARPreReqAprovacaos kill ^VARPreReqAprovacaoLinha, ^VARPreReqAprovacaoLinhas set count = count + 4 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Item Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Item Master Related Data... " kill ^INART, ^INARTs kill ^INARTA kill ^INARTAVG, ^INARTAVGs kill ^INARTCHANGE kill ^INARTHIST, ^INARTHISTs kill ^INARTHISTL, ^INARTHISTLs kill ^INARTK kill ^INARTLP kill ^INARTLOCPAR, ^INARTLOCPARs kill ^INARTPACK, ^INARTPACKs kill ^INARTSP kill ^INARTUPC kill ^INARTUPC1, ^INARTUPC1s kill ^INItemGroup, ^INItemGroups set count = count + 14 w !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Location Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Location Master Related Data... " kill ^WWW0121, ^WWW0121s kill ^INLP, ^INLPs kill ^INLPCHIP kill ^INLPLAYOUT kill ^INLPLAYOUTP kill ^INLPLAYOUTSAVE set count = count + 6 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Supplier Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Supplier Master Related Data... " kill ^INLIEF, ^INLIEFs kill ^INLIEFA kill ^INLIEFAccountsLine kill ^INLIEFCAT kill ^INLIEFD, ^INLIEFDs kill ^INSupMastAgree, ^INSupMastAgrees kill ^INSupMastAgreeItem, ^INSupMastAgreeItems kill ^INAgreeReq, ^INAgreeReqs kill ^INAgreeReqLine, ^INAgreeReqLines kill ^INAgreeResp, ^INAgreeResps kill ^INAgreeRespLine, ^INAgreeRespLines kill ^INPARTN, ^INPARTNs kill ^INRAHMEN, ^INRAHMENs kill ^INRAHMENGROUP kill ^INREBUCH, ^INREBUCHs kill ^INBrand, ^INBrands set count = count + 16 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Receive from Supplier Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Receive from Supplier Related Data... " kill ^INREC, ^INRECs kill ^INRECLine, ^INRECLines kill ^INRECSummary, ^INRECSummarys kill ^INRECReverse, ^INRECReverses kill ^INRECTRF, ^INRECTRFs kill ^INRECTemp set count = count + 6 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Requisition Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Requisition Related Data... " kill ^INReq kill ^INReqFirm kill ^INReqIssue kill ^INReqLine, ^INReqLines kill ^INReqRelease kill ^INReqSource kill ^INReqSourceLineHist, ^INReqSourceLineHists kill ^INReqSummary, ^INReqSummarys kill ^INReqTemplate kill ^INReqTemplateLine kill ^INReqToSupOrder, ^INReqToSupOrders kill ^INReqToSupOrderLine, ^INReqToSupOrderLines kill ^INRequisition, ^INRequisitions kill ^INIssue, ^INIssues kill ^INIssueLine, ^INIssueLines kill ^INIssuePickLine, ^INIssuePickLines kill ^INIssueRev, ^INIssueRevs kill ^INIssueRevLine, ^INIssueRevLines set count = count + 18 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Old SOH Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Old SOH Related Data... " kill ^INWE, ^INWEs kill ^INWEALT, ^INWEALTs kill ^INWEAUF, ^INWEAUFs kill ^INWEAUFPT, ^INWEAUFPTs kill ^INWEAUFVOR, ^INWEAUFVORs kill ^INWEBUCH kill ^INWECounter, ^INWECounters kill ^INWEFREI, ^INWEFREIs kill ^INWEINV, ^INWEINVs kill ^INWEINVCYC kill ^INWEINVP, ^INWEINVPs kill ^INWER, ^INWERs kill ^INWEUM, ^INWEUMs kill ^INAvgCost, ^INAvgCosts set count = count +14 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; New SOH Related Data (sent by Paul - to be completed) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "New SOH Related Data... " kill ^alSOH.dBundleAttributeI kill ^alSOH.dBundleI kill ^alSOH.dBundleStockI kill ^alSOH.dBundleStockD kill ^alINV.dItem kill ^alINV.dItemPolicyD kill ^alINV.dItemPolicyI kill ^alSOH.dSOHD kill ^alSOH.dStockBalanceD kill ^alSOH.dStockBalanceI kill ^alSOH.dStockHistoryD kill ^alSOH.dStockHistoryI kill ^alDRP.iMovementD kill ^alDRP.iMovementI kill ^alSOH.dPeriodBalanceD kill ^alSOH.dSOHPeriodD kill ^alSOH.dSOHPeriodI kill ^alLOC.dLocation set count = count + 11 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; AEP Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "AEP Related Data... " kill ^AEPFinalMapping, ^AEPFinalMappings kill ^AEPInitialMapping, ^AEPInitialMappings kill ^AEPNegotiationMapping, ^AEPNegotiationMappings kill ^AEPNegotiationThreadMapping, ^AEPNegotiationThreadMappings kill ^AEPOffer, ^AEPOffers kill ^AEPOfferInstallment, ^AEPOfferInstallments kill ^AEPOfferLineItem, ^AEPOfferLineItems kill ^AEPPurchaseRequisition, ^AEPPurchaseRequisitions kill ^AEPPurchaseRequisitionLine, ^AEPPurchaseRequisitionLines kill ^AEPRALot, ^AEPRALots kill ^AEPRALotLineItem, ^AEPRALotLineItems kill ^AEPRALotProposal, ^AEPRALotProposals kill ^AEPRARFQ, ^AEPRARFQs kill ^AEPTempNegThreadMapping, ^AEPTempNegThreadMappings set count = count + 14 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; DCM Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "DCM Related Data... " kill ^COMDCMDebug kill ^COMDCMEventsProcessed, ^COMDCMEventsProcesseds kill ^COMDCMEventsProcessedData kill ^COMDCMEventsProcessedDataComple kill ^COMDCMEventsProcessedTarget kill ^COMDCMEventsProcessedTargetRetu kill ^COMDCMEventsQueue kill ^COMDCMEventsQueueData kill ^COMDCMEventsQueueDataComplex kill ^COMDCMMethodsRun, ^COMDCMMethodsRuns kill ^COMDCMMethodsRunData kill ^COMScheduleMessage, ^COMScheduleMessages set count = count + 12 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; COMView Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "COMView Related Data... " set idWWW001 = $order(^COMView(0, "")) while ($length(idWWW001) > 0) { set idView = $order(^COMView(0, idWWW001, ""))
while ($length(idView) > 0) { set objView = ^COMView(0, idWWW001, idView, 1)
if (('$$$COMViewDistribute(objView)) && ($length($$$COMViewUser1(objView)) > 0)) { kill ^COMView(0, idWWW001, idView) kill ^COMViewColumn(0, idWWW001, idView) kill ^COMViewFilter(0, idWWW001, idView) }
set idView = $order(^COMView(0, idWWW001, idView)) }
set idWWW001 = $order(^COMView(0, idWWW001)) } kill ^COMViewUser kill ^COMViewUserSize kill ^COMViewColumnUser kill ^COMViewLog set count = count + 4 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Financial Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Financial Related Data... " kill ^FINAPInvMatchCache, ^FINAPInvMatchCaches kill ^FINAPSupplier set count = count + 2 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; DRP Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "DRP Related Data... " kill ^INDRPBESTVOR, ^INDRPBESTVORs kill ^INDRPDEMAND, ^INDRPDEMANDs kill ^INDRPDEMANDHIST, ^INDRPDEMANDHISTs kill ^INDRPITEM kill ^INDRPMESPROT, ^INDRPMESPROTs kill ^INDRPRUNJOB, ^INDRPRUNJOBs kill ^INDRPRUNPROT kill ^INDRPSUPPLY, ^INDRPSUPPLYs kill ^INDRPUMBUCH kill ^INDRPUMLKW, ^INDRPUMLKWs kill ^INDRPUMTOUR, ^INDRPUMTOURs kill ^INDRPUMTVOR, ^INDRPUMTVORs kill ^INDRPWV, ^INDRPWVs set count = count + 13 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Orders Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Orders Related Data... " kill ^INAUF, ^INAUFs kill ^INAUF1, ^INAUF1s kill ^INAUF1b kill ^INAUF1bi kill ^INAUF1SEL kill ^INAUF1SEL3 kill ^INAUF1SELT kill ^INAUFA kill ^INAUFb kill ^INAUFbi kill ^INAUFP, ^INAUFPs kill ^INAUFPA, ^INAUFPAs kill ^INAUFPb kill ^INAUFPbi kill ^INAUFPK kill ^INAUFPPREISLOG kill ^INAUFPT, ^INAUFPTs kill ^INAUFPXL kill ^INXAUF, ^INXAUFs kill ^INXAUF1, ^INXAUF1s kill ^INXAUFP, ^INXAUFPs kill ^INXAUFPb kill ^INXAUFPbi kill ^INXAUFPK kill ^INXAUFPLA, ^INXAUFPLAs kill ^INXAUFPSP, ^INXAUFPSPs kill ^INXAUFPT, ^INXAUFPTs kill ^INXAUFPXL, ^INXAUFPXLs kill ^INXWEAUF, ^INXWEAUFs set count = count + 29 w !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; New PO Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "New PO Related Data... " kill ^INPO, ^INPOs kill ^INPODiscount, ^INPODiscounts kill ^INPODiscountRule, ^INPODiscountRules kill ^INPODiscounts, ^INPODiscountss kill ^INPOLine, ^INPOLines kill ^INPOLineTemplate kill ^INPORev kill ^INPOSummary, ^INPOSummarys kill ^INPOTempDO kill ^INPOTemplate set count = count + 10 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."

" kill ^INTFR, ^INTFRs kill ^INTFRLine, ^INTFRLines kill ^INTFRPickLine, ^INTFRPickLines kill ^INTFRRev, ^INTFRRevs kill ^INTFRRevLine set count = count + 5 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Stock Operations Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Stock Operations Related Data... " kill ^INADJ, ^INADJs kill ^INADJATT, ^INADJATTs kill ^INADJATTLine, ^INADJATTLines kill ^INADJLine, ^INADJLines kill ^INMOV, ^INMOVs kill ^INMOVLine, ^INMOVLines kill ^INRMA, ^INRMAs kill ^INStockValCCAdj set count = count + 6 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."

" kill ^INMO, ^INMOs kill ^INMOLine, ^INMOLines kill ^INMORev, ^INMORevs kill ^INMORevLine, ^INMORevLines kill ^INPROPLAN, ^INPROPLANs kill ^INPROSTEMP kill ^INPROSTEMP1 kill ^INPROSTEMPT kill ^INPROSTEMPU set count = count + 9 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."

" kill ^MEDAdmission, ^MEDAdmissions kill ^MEDAuthorize, ^MEDAuthorizes kill ^MEDDispense, ^MEDDispenses kill ^MEDPatient, ^MEDPatients kill ^MEDPrescription, ^MEDPrescriptions kill ^MEDPrescriptionLine, ^MEDPrescriptionLines kill ^MEDProvider, ^MEDProviders set count = count + 6 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."

^VARGEN06A kill ^VARGEN6A kill ^VARGEN6K kill ^VARGuiaRemessaNF, ^VARGuiaRemessaNFs kill ^VARHCT08 kill ^VARHCT08A kill ^VARINADJ, ^VARINADJs kill ^VARINADJDoacao, ^VARINADJDoacaos kill // Stephen Hobby: // There is a duplication of data that is stored in INART // but also now in a storage using Cache objects. // This line helps to keep them in sync. write !, "Setting Conversion Data... " set ^COMConversion(0, "INART", 1) = "alINV.dUItem" set ^COMConversion(0, "INFIBITEMGROUP", 1) = "alINV.dUItemGroup" set ^COMConversion(0, "INItemGroup", 1) = "alINV.dUItemGroup" set ^COMConversion(0, "INItemPolicy", 1) = "alSOH.dUSourcingPolicy" set ^COMConversion(0, "INLP", 1) = "alLOC.dUStorage" set ^COMConversion(0, "INSOHPeriodType", 1) = "alSOH.dUPeriodType" set ^COMConversion(0, "WWW0121", 1) = "alLOC.dULocation" //set ^COMConversion(0, "INItemPolicy", 1) = "alSOH.dUSourcingPolicy"
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Users Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Users Related Data... " // Salva usuários set GUSTAVO = $get(^WWW013(0, "GUSTAVO", 1)) set RODRIGO = $get(^WWW013(0, "RODRIGO", 1)) set MARCELO = $get(^WWW013(0, "MARCELO", 1)) set PABLO = $get(^WWW013(0, "PABLO", 1)) set RODRIGOT = $get(^WWW013(0, "RODRIGOT", 1)) set TULIO = $get(^WWW013(0, "TULIO", 1)) set TULIO2 = $get(^WWW013(0, "TULIO2", 1)) set TULIOUSER = $get(^WWW013(0, "TULIOUSER", 1)) set TULIOEN = $get(^WWW013(0, "TULIOEN", 1)) set NATALIA = $get(^WWW013(0, "NATALIA", 1)) set GUILHERME = $get(^WWW013(0, "GUILHERME", 1)) set SOSTHENES = $get(^WWW013(0, "SOSTHENES", 1)) set THIAGO = $get(^WWW013(0, "THIAGO", 1)) set RUBENS = $get(^WWW013(0, "RUBENS", 1)) set LUCAS = $get(^WWW013(0, "LUCAS", 1)) set ADMIN = $get(^WWW013(0, "ADMIN", 1)) set SHADOW = $get(^WWW013(0, "SHADOW", 1)) set MAGNO = $get(^WWW013(0, "MAGNO", 1))
// Mata todos os usuários kill ^WWW013, ^WWW013s
// Recria apenas esses usuários: set ^WWW013(0, "GUSTAVO", 1) = GUSTAVO set ^WWW013(0, "RODRIGO", 1) = RODRIGO set ^WWW013(0, "MARCELO", 1) = MARCELO set ^WWW013(0, "PABLO", 1) = PABLO set ^WWW013(0, "RODRIGOT", 1) = RODRIGOT set ^WWW013(0, "TULIO", 1) = TULIO set ^WWW013(0, "TULIO2", 1) = TULIO2 set ^WWW013(0, "TULIOEN", 1) = TULIOEN set ^WWW013(0, "TULIOUSER", 1) = TULIOUSER set ^WWW013(0, "GUILHERME", 1) = GUILHERME set ^WWW013(0, "SOSTHENES", 1) = SOSTHENES set ^WWW013(0, "NATALIA", 1) = NATALIA set ^WWW013(0, "THIAGO", 1) = THIAGO set ^WWW013(0, "RUBENS", 1) = RUBENS set ^WWW013(0, "LUCAS", 1) = LUCAS set ^WWW013(0, "ADMIN", 1) = ADMIN set ^WWW013(0, "SHADOW", 1) = SHADOW set ^WWW013(0, "MAGNO", 1) = MAGNO write !, "Reindexing WWW013... " set VORG(1) = "WWW013" do ^WWWSORT write !, "WWW013 reindexed!"
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Log Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Log Related Data... " kill ^WWWPRO kill ^WWWLAST set count = count + 2 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ; Login Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - write !, "Login Related Data... " kill ^WWWERROR kill ^WWWLOGIN kill ^WWWFOOL set count = count + 3 write !, count_" Globals Killed ..."
//Setting conversion globals: do ..ReloadINItemPolicy() do ConvertAll^COMConversion
write !, "End time: "_$ztime($piece($horolog, ",", 2), 1)

Method.name: ResetNumerators
Method.Implementation:
// Set the field "Reset On Change Over" that reset the // sequence when the year change
$$$VAR
// Reset numerator at turn of the year set ^WWW128(YM, "INADJ", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INADJATT", 1) = "ATR000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INAgreeReq", 1) = "SRP000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INAgreeResp", 1) = "RSRP000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INART", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INAUF", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INBrand", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INDRPDEMAND", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INDRPSUPPLY", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INDRPUMLKW", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INDRPUMTOUR", 1) = "D000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INIssue", 1) = "EXYEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INIssueRev", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INItemStatus", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INLIEF", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INLP", 1) = "000000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INMO", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INMOV", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INREC", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INRECLine", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INRECReverse", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INRECTRF", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INReceipt", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INReceiptLine", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INReq", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INReqToSupOrder", 1) = "000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INRequisition", 1) = "000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INStockValCCAdj", 1) = "00000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INSupMastAgree", 1) = "ATA000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "INTFR", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INTFRLine", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "INTfrGroupNumber", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "INWEINVP", 1) = "YEAR/0000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1)
set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDAdmission", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDAuthorize", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDPatient", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDPrescription", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDPrescriptionDispense", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "MEDProvider", 1) = 0
set ^WWW128(YM, "VARAta", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARBancoPrecoEstimativa", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARCertidoesFornecedor", 1) = 0
set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContrato", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContratoAditivo", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContratoNotificacao", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContratoExecutor", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContratoManutencao", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "VARContratoTipo", 1) = 0
set ^WWW128(YM, "VARDoacaoEntidade", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "VAROrdemUnitarizacao", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARPaciente", 1) = "00000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "VARPacienteAutorizacao", 1) = "000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "VARPedidoCompra", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARPreRequisicao", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARPrograma", 1) = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "VARProfSaude", 1) = "000000" set ^WWW128(YM, "VARProprietario") = 0 set ^WWW128(YM, "VARTCIINAUF", 1) = "YEAR/000000~1~1~"_$piece($zdate($horolog,3),"-",1) set ^WWW128(YM, "VARTransportadora", 1) = 0
set ^WWW128(YM, "WWW0121", 1) = 0
set ^WWW128(YM, "VARAtaLinha", 1) = 0

Method.name: ReloadINLP
FixSESAU
ListAllGlobalsWithData
ReloadINItemPolicy
Method.Implementation: // Rodar somente quando os dados da ^INItemPolicy forem recarregados do ^WWWVAR kill ^LogUpgradeHandler("COMPIT16510A") do StartLog^COMLog("COMPIT16501A", .log) do Execute^COMPIT16510A(log) set sc = ##class(alSOH.dTransactionType).RebuildTypes() set id = "" for { set id = $order(^INItemPolicy(0, id)) if (id = "") quit set objPol = $get(^INItemPolicy(0, id, 1)) write !, id_": "_$$Save^COMUtils("INItemPolicy", id, objPol, 1) }
